fxInfo_citation: Hughes, Paxton, Clayton, and Zetterberg (2018); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: A quota is the minimum threshold, understood as a percentage (%) of the total seats in the legislature. Coded only for years where a gender quota was present.
fxInfo_question: What is the threshold of the quota for the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature?
fxInfo_sources: QAROT dataset (Hughes, Paxton, Clayton, and Zetterberg 2017), Quota project (2017); Coding by project manager.
name: v2lgqugent
